page.title: 10AIRDRIE'S NEW HOSPICE 2
page.content: THE ONLY GROUNDS FOR REFUSAL TO TAKE ANY PATIENT IN WILL BE LACK OF ROOM. ALREADY IT IS TOO SMALL AS THERE ARE 60-70 ELIGIBLE PATIENTS. THE TERMINAL PATIENTS WILL BE SURROUNDED BY CHRISTIAN PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT AFRAID OF DEATH AND WHO WILL LOVINGLY PREPARE THEIR CHARGES FOR THEIR FINAL MOMENTS. AIRDRIE HOSPICE IS SPECIAL TO US AS IT IS A PIECE OF HISTORY IN THE MAKING AND ALSO AS WE WILL BE ABLE TO SAY THAT WE HELPED BUILD IT. THE ESTIMATED OPENING IS LATE 1986. AIRDRIE, LIKE OTHER WEST OF SCOTLAND TOWNS, AT TIMES EXHIBITS RELIGIOUS BIGOTRY. THIS WEEK IN THE LOCAL ADVERTISER THE CALDERCRUIX DERRY BOYS ASSOCIATION COMPLAINED BITTERLY ABOUT PEOPLE HAVING TO SUBSCRIBE TO, ACCORDING TO THEM,TO THE 'CATHOLICS'.
